text: "Honesty" is a 1979 song by Billy Joel and is the third track from his sixth studio album 52nd Street. It went to number 1 in France, number 8 in South Africa, number 10 in Italy, number 16 in Canada, number 20 in Zimbabwe, number 24 in the United States and number 29 in France and was covered by Beyoncé in 2008. ==Track listing== *US single #"Honesty" – 3:53 #"The Mexican Connection" – 3:38 *Dutch single/CBS 7150 #"Honesty" – 3:53 #"Root Beer Rag" – 2:59 *CBS single #"Honesty" #"My Life" == References == Category:1979 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Honesty (Billy Joel song)
